title: Unjust 20 minute leave queue timer pls fix
body:
Hi devs,

My last game I played I began to experience 500 ping so instead of feeding I went to my base to wait it out until 30 minutes into the game It was fixed and I tried my best to play out the game. I feel like that was the best thing I could have possibly done for my team, however because I wasn't moving in base for an extended period despite not disconnecting, I still received a "leavebuster" notice. Now I have 20 minute queues for what I believe will be 5 games- I don't really have that kind of time extra to burn in my weekday schedule. Could this by any chance be lifted as its obviously unjust?

tyty

Nitrogoat OCE

replies.body:
Regardless of the reason you were inactive in the match, your absence from participating negatively impacts *everyone* in the match. For this reason, the system treats all inactivity equally and we're unable to make modifications to Leaverbuster penalties.

I strongly recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your network settings are configured properly for League and to prevent these symptoms from cropping up again. If you encounter further issues with this, let me know.

â€‹I was in Champion Select, and once we all locked in and there was 20 sec left for game, out of nowhere it kicked me out saying that someone else logged into my account, i tried to go back, but it kept saying im disconnected, i closed the client and re-opened, it then said that there was a problem with this patch and will send me to the old one to make the update, it sent me back to the Warwick's loading screen and made an update until the new blood moon diana came, i logged in and once i did it was too late i went in game and my team was remaking.

2 agreed to the remake and 3 did not, which for no reason it made a remake anyway, and made me lose my LP from 90 to 72, and gave me a 10 min ban for no reason, for something i never did, the client itself kicked me out and made an update then let me in.
My request here is too look over what just happened both my ban losing LP and why this bug happened, and i want my LP back, its my right to get my LP back and to get this ban removed, because i have not done anything wrong, the game itself have done this, and its not the first time, every time i get 90+ LP it does it and makes me go down, please give me my right where the ban would be removed and my LP will be back to 90, and to please check the nonsense that happened in that game, because its not mathematically correct where 2 people pressed yes for a remake and 3 pressed no, but the remake happened anyways.

IGN: hazim123
